data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Baiul's grandfather gave her first skates to her when she was three years old. When ____ mother ____, ____ became ____ orphan ( had ____ parents ). But ____ kept ____, ____ won ____ world ____ when ____ was ____ 15 ____ old. She became famous for her artistic ability when she skated as "the swan" to win the Olympics when she was 16.
data.partBlankContent: Baiul's grandfather gave her first skates to her when she was three years old. When h__ mother di__, s__ became a_ orphan ( had n_ parents ). But s__ kept ska____, a__ won t__ world champi_______ when s__ was on__ 15 ye___ old. She became famous for her artistic ability when she skated as "the swan" to win the Olympics when she was 16.
data.answer: 在她三岁的时候，她的祖父给了她第一双冰鞋。她母亲死后，她成了孤儿。但是她一直在滑冰，并且在她只有15岁的时候就赢得了世界冠军。16岁时，她以“天鹅”的形象赢得了奥运会冠军。
